#define pb push_back
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define ll long long
#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int q,i,m,l,j,ans=0,k;
char s[20010];
int dp[2][510];
int main() {
	cin>>s;
	scanf("%d",&q);
int	le=strlen(s);
	for(k=1;k<=q;k++)
	{
		ans=0;
		scanf("%d%d",&m,&l);
		memset(dp,0,sizeof(dp));
		int x=0;
		for(i=0;s[i];i++)
		{
			x=!x;
			for(j=0;j<m;j++)
			{
				if(dp[!x][j]>0)
				dp[x][(j*10+(s[i]-'0'))%m]+=dp[!x][j];
				dp[!x][j]=0;
			}
			dp[x][(s[i]-'0')%m]++;
			ans+=dp[x][l];
		}
		
		printf("%d\n",ans);
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
